GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: uvc: fix sg handling during video encode

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit c028cec22129d61e2673d437dd6150fd710edd9c, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit e81e7f9a0eb9536d5976acf5d95290338032a198. For more details please see the references link.
